sentences.en: Bitmapped maps require huge storage space.
sentences.cn: 位图贴图需要巨大的存储空间。

sentences.en: Buyers might require further assurances before parting with their cash.
sentences.cn: 买方在付现之前可能要求提供进一步的担保。

sentences.en: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.cn: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.en: Do you require full or half board?
sentences.cn: 你要全食宿还是半食宿？

sentences.en: Good customer relations require courtesy, professionalism and effective response.
sentences.cn: 良好的客户关系需要做到礼貌、专业，并提供有效的回复。

sentences.en: If you require further information, you should consult the registrar.
sentences.cn: 如果需要进一步了解信息，请咨询教务主任。

sentences.en: In time these new excavations will require conservation.
sentences.cn: 这些刚发掘出来的物品需要及时保护。

sentences.en: Larger drawings tend to require two or three exposures to cover them.
sentences.cn: 较大的图画往往需要两三张胶片才能拍下来。

sentences.en: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.cn: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

sentences.en: Most mechanical devices require oil as a lubricant.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数机械装置都需要用油作为润滑剂。

sentences.en: My job is so repetitive, it does not require much conscious thought.
sentences.cn: 我的工作重复性很强, 不需要很多有意识的思考.

sentences.en: Resolving the dispute will require a mood of conciliation on both sides.
sentences.cn: 解决这一争端需要双方都有和解的意愿。

sentences.en: The bill failed to get the required number of votes.
sentences.cn: 法案没有得到规定的票数。

sentences.en: The symphony does require a largish group of players.
sentences.cn: 这首交响曲确实需要为数不少的一组演奏者。

sentences.en: These pets require a lot of care and attention.
sentences.cn: 这些宠物需要悉心照顾。

sentences.en: True emotion ought not to require overstatement.
sentences.cn: 真实的感情不应当需要过分渲染。

sentences.en: We should require that every student is immunized against hepatitis B.
sentences.cn: 我们应要求每个学生都注射乙肝疫苗。

sentences.en: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.cn: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.en: You may have free passage across our territory whenever you require it.
sentences.cn: 无论你什么时候需要，都可以自由穿过我们的领地。

words.tran_cn: 需要（require的过去式及过去分词形式）；要求

trans.tran_cn: 需要； 要求； 命令
